Overview
SmartSimple has many built in tools and features to improve your productivity and help you accomplish your goals. Learn more about these tools and features, how to configure them and how to use them below:
Tools/Feature Articles
Tab Bar
How to enable and use the Tab Bar mode.
Excel Parser
How to give your community the ability to complete budgets using the Microsoft Excel and use the data in the completed spreadsheet to populate fields and create activities.
Application Connectivity Summary Diagram
How to access and use the Application Connectivity Summary Diagram.
User Delegation
How to use the delegation feature to entrust work to other users in your SmartSimple instance
Field Revision Annotations
How to use and set up the Field Revision Annotations feature which allows users to add notes and responses directly to specific fields within a record for improved collaboration.
Privacy and Security Policies
How to use and set up the Privacy and Security Policies feature which acts as an important compliance checkpoint that mitigates risks and fosters user trust by detailing how data will be protected.
